nature_language: [当前位置南京,目标位置成都,旅行人数2,旅行天数4] 我和我闺蜜俩人打算报团去成都玩4天，我们都是大学生，会拍照，希望景点键嘎嘎出片，有意思
nature_language_en: [Current location: Nanjing, Destination: Chengdu, Number of travelers: 2, Travel days: 4] My best friend and I are planning to join a tour group to visit Chengdu for 4 days. We are both university students and enjoy taking photos. We hope the attractions are photogenic and interesting.
